availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Gallagher (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Charles Gallagher and Winnie Gallagher. Married Mary Benedict Gallagher in Jefferson County, Kentucky on April 22, 1857. Resident in Louisville, Kentucky in 1850. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Partners with William H. Sparke in Sparke & Gallagher, Grocers and Commission Merchants in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 468.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 699.Kentucky Marriage Records, Jefferson County, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708, p.13.
